title: INtravel
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Delta unveils stylish new uniforms with Missoni accessories, a nod to classic looks and a return of the 'wrap dress'
items.description: Delta invited TPG to an unveiling of its new uniforms in Atlanta. Here's the story behind the chic changes.

items.title: The easy route: How to redeem Capital One miles at a fixed value
items.description: This step-by-step guide shows you how to redeem your Capital One miles at a fixed value on travel purchases from your statement, to earn cash back and...

items.title: Choice Privileges announces positive changes to its loyalty program
items.description: Choice Privileges just announced some changes to its loyalty program that will occur in 2026 and beyond. Here's what we know so far about these change...

items.title: Southwest adds Philippine Airlines as 4th international partner
items.description: Southwest Airlines has unveiled its latest partnership with an international carrier, Philippine Airlines, which is based in Manila.

items.title: The 15 best Christmas markets in Europe for 2025
items.description: Plan to visit one of the best Christmas markets in Europe, from France to Estonia, in 2025.
